sentences.english: In 1911, the Wuchang Uprising fired here.
sentences.chinese: 武昌起義打響第一槍在這裏。

sentences.english: Many revolutionary devotees were blooded in Wuchang Uprise.
sentences.chinese: 武昌起義使很多熱血志士首次經受革命的洗禮。

sentences.english: The Wuchang Uprising fired the first shot against the feudal imperial regime.
sentences.chinese: 武昌起義打響了推翻封建朝廷的第一槍。
